beats.text: |VS| Suddenly, something else caught $hero_name’s attention |VS| ‘Who is that? There...reflected in the water. That great grey shape. He looks old this $storyTime, Little man-cub. Look at his fur... it's greyer than I remember.’
‘And look.. on the left. They aren’t in the jungle. They are standing next to a $avatar_amenity. They look lost.’ |VS| $hero_name tried to get a better look.
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 5 ▓▓▓▓▓|$hero_name looks to|the left of|their reflection.

beats.text: ‘Hah! No... that's just me. That's just us. The water plays tricks; makes you look like a stranger to yourself,’ |VS| Said $hero_name walking closer to the reflection, feeling a bit off…|VS|
‘I've seen enough. The water makes me full. Let's find dry land. Where to next?’
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓ ✓ PAGE 5  ▓▓▓▓|A new page is|in the backpack.
